description: 한국 웹툰/만화 스타일 캐릭터 이미지 생성 가이드 - 실사 인물/스틱맨 사용 금지

characterStyle.description: 모든 인물은 한국 웹툰/만화 스타일로만 표현 - 실사 인물, 스틱맨 절대 금지!
characterStyle.warning: ⚠️ 실사 인물(사진처럼 사실적인 사람), 스틱맨(막대기 인간) 생성 절대 금지!
characterStyle.webtoon_character: Korean WEBTOON/manhwa style character with EXAGGERATED EXPRESSION, 30-50 year old Korean man or woman, clean bold outlines, vibrant flat colors

emotions.happy: bright smile, cheerful eyes, soft blush
emotions.sad: downcast eyes, slight frown, tear drops
emotions.surprised: wide eyes, open mouth, sweat drops
emotions.shocked: extremely wide eyes, mouth agape, impact lines
emotions.angry: furrowed brows, gritted teeth, anger marks
emotions.crying: closed eyes, tears streaming, trembling mouth

expressions.shocked_face: EXAGGERATED SHOCKED EXPRESSION (wide eyes, open mouth, sweat drops)
expressions.worried_face: WORRIED/PANICKED EXPRESSION (sweating, raised eyebrows, anxious mouth)
expressions.emotional_face: EMOTIONAL EXPRESSION (gentle sad eyes, slight smile)

backgroundStyle.description: 배경은 주제와 관련된 상세한 배경으로 표현

general_style.base: Detailed background related to the scene context, vibrant colors

settings.kitchen: detailed Korean kitchen with modern appliances, warm lighting through window
settings.living_room: cozy living room with comfortable furniture, warm lamp light
settings.outdoor: Korean city street or neighborhood, shops and signs, natural sunlight
settings.office: modern office interior, computers, professional atmosphere

overallStyle.style: Korean webtoon/manhwa style illustration with comic-style expression marks (sweat drops, impact lines)

example_prompts.emotional_scene: Korean WEBTOON/manhwa style illustration, 16:9 aspect ratio. Morning light through window. NO photorealistic, NO stickman, NO anime, NO 3D render.
